Title: The Bet
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Laura McCreary, Lesley Arfin (executive story editor), Gil Ozeri (executive story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: While Holt holds a celebration for Charles after he is awarded the Medal of Valor, Amy is forced to go on a ridiculous date with Jake after she loses their long running bet.
